reviewText: Not at all the best work I have seen

These are old loops with embarrassing acting, mostly black and white, minimal to no storyline and overall boring.  The title raises expectation well above the delivery.  I was sucked in by the blurbs and cover and I regret it.  It might be worth about 6 bucks for someone with a high boredom threshhold someone with a real fetish for bondage.
This movie is real zero, the strips were falling a part and filming was terrible. That is the best I can say for it

All the films are from Tao productions. If you like their style (and I don't) you may find it a pleasant trip down memory lane. I would have preferred films from several studios. Also the copies are pretty bad. The originals were offered on 8mm film and the copying process they used did nothing to enhance the originals. In fact I think the copies are worse than the originals.

So minus 1 star for being all Tao and minus another for the copy. 3 stars just for the nostalgia factor.
